|cpu1chip1 = NXP;i.MX8MQ;MIMX8MQ, 6DVAJZAA, i.MX8M Quad; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 1 |cpu1_total_cores = 5 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-M4 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 266 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Quad SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC16GAKAECN-2M WT; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC 5.0 |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MT25QL256ABA1EW9-0SIT; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 3200MHz |ram1size = 3 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53B768M32D4NQ-062 WT:B; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, J401,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1, HDMI 2.0a, Audio out (3.5mm), MicroSD Card slot, |addchip = 24-bit 192kHz Stereo DAC;Wolfson;WM8524;WM8524G, 68AMGHT;1; ,,, 14-channel PMIC;NXP;PF4210;NXP, PC32PF42, 10A0ES, XADGTA;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/04/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 449 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata Type 1CQ (KM6N16055) |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43596; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://www.mouser.com/ds/2/302/IMX8MDQLQEVKHUG-1280333.pdf Datasheet]
"SCH-29615 REV B2" is silkscreened on the [https://www.nxp.com/assets/images/en/dev-board-image/MCIMX8M-EVK-TOP.jpg board] in the FCC photos.
The product page claims ''4GB LPDDR4'' but the FCC internal photos :show a [https://www.micron.com/parts/dram/mobile-ddr4-sdram/mt53b768m32d4nq-062-wt Micron MT53B768M32D4NQ-062 WT:B] which is 3GB :according to the [https://www.micron.com/~/media/documents/products/other-documents/nxp_compatibility_chart.pdf ''NXP Compatibility Chart'' from '''Micron'''].
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/01/11/develop-nxp-i-mx-8m-voice-controlled-smart-devices-with-mcimx8m-evk-evaluation-kit/ ''NXP MCIMX8M-EVK'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ([https://www.cnx-software.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/NXP-i.MX-8M-Evaluation-Kit-Block-Diagram.png Block Diagram])
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX8MQ (MIMX8MQ) ([https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/applications-processors/i.mx-applications-processors/i.mx-8-processors/i.mx-8m-family-armcortex-a53-cortex-m4-audio-voice-video:i.MX8M i.MX8M] Quad) :4x ARM Cortex-A53 (1.5GHz) :1x ARM Cortex-M4 (266MHz) :GPU: ''Vivante'' GC7000L *Flash: 16GB (eMMC 5.0), 32MB (Quad SPI NOR) *RAM: 3GB (LPDDR4 SDRAM 3200MHz) *Ports: 1x GbE (10/100/1000) Ethernet :2x USB 3.0 (Type A & Type C) *WiFi: 802.11abgn/ac MIMO 2x2 ([https://wireless.murata.com/eng/products/rf-modules-1/wi-fi-bluetooth-for-nxp-i-mx.html Murata Type 1CQ]) *Bluetooth: BT 4.1/EDR (KM6N16055 module) *Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2 Key E), microSD Card slot *Video: MIPI-CSI Camera mini-SAS :HDMI 2.0a, MIPI-DSI Display mini-SAS *Audio: AudioCODEC (3.5mm jack) :32bit audio samples with 768KHz *Power: 12V/5A Power Supply Unit :PMIC: NXP PF4210 (PMIC, DCDC/LDO)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
